job.title: Software Engineer, Apple Pay
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brApple Pay Server Engineering is the place to be if you are interested in working on awesome technology that is used by millions of people every single day As part of the Apple Pay Server Engineering team you will have the opportunity to explore and contribute to a wide variety of interesting projects within Apple Pay If you meet the key qualifications and you are selfdriven enthusiastic highlymotivated and you want to make an impact wed love to hear from youbrbrbrWere open to candidates for the following campuses NYC Austin or Cupertinobrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong brMinimum 5 years relevant industry experiencebrbrExperience writing server software in Java or CC or CbrbrExperienceKnowledge working on highly scalable applications and RESTful web servicesbrbrKnowledge of databases both SQL and NoSQLbrbrFamiliarity with scalability and performance issuesbrbrUnderstand software development process from inception to delivery of code to productionbrbrStrong Computer Science backgroundbrbrInterest in payment industrybrbrExperienceunderstanding of security and cryptography not mandatorybrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong br Responsible for designing and developing highly reliable scalable server platforms with attention to detail brbr Follow our software development process including writing unit tests perform code reviews etc brbr Ability to learn and apply new technologies quickly brbr Work effectively with crossfunctional teams to develop features brbr Provide support for production deployments brbr Demonstrate ability to deliver results on time with high qualitybrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brBachelor in Computer Science or equivalentbrbr brRole Number 200238369brbr
